front.title: The Effect of Packet Loss on Voice Quality for TDM over Pseudowires

abstract.t: The effect of packet loss on voice quality has been the subject of detailed study in the VoIP community, but these results are not directly applicable to TDM transport as being studied in the PWE WG. The present document presents an analysis of packet loss for the TDM over PW case, and demonstrates that packet loss of a few percent can be tolerated. We propose that robustness to packet loss of a few percent be a requirement for any proposed method for transport of TDM over pseudowires.
